General.Name: Vardhman Acrylics Limited
General.Description: Vardhman Acrylics Limited manufactures and supplies acrylic fibers and tows in India. It provides the products under the VARLAN brand name, which are widely used for manufacture of winter wear including sweaters, woolen fabric; and technical textiles, such as non-woven and carpets etc. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India. Vardhman Acrylics Limited is a subsidiary of Vardhman Textiles Limited.

0.Name: Mr. Bal Krishan Choudhary B.Sc., M.B.A., M.Com.
0.Title: MD & Non-Independent Exec. Director
